item.title: Concept Blue
item.description: Sharing the config.toml used in this website: # Better code higlighting # via https://discourse.gohugo.io/t/pygmentscodefences-how-to-choose-themes/3842/3 pygmentsCodefences = true pygmentsStyle = "vs" # Integrations googleAnalytics = "UA-XXXXXX-XX" disqusShortname = "your-disqus-shortname" # Hightlight theme [markup.highlight] style = "github" # Allow HTML rendering inside markdown [markup.
